verses.name: Matthew 10:10
verses.text: Nor scrip for your journey, neither two coats, neither shoes, nor yet staves: for the workman is worthy of his meat.

verses.name: Matthew 10:11
verses.text: And into whatsoever city or town ye shall enter, enquire who in it is worthy; and there abide till ye go thence.

verses.name: Matthew 10:12
verses.text: And when ye come into an house, salute it.

verses.name: Matthew 10:13
verses.text: And if the house be worthy, let your peace come upon it: but if it be not worthy, let your peace return to you.
